Content: I live in ny and own a 2008 Hyosung GV250 straight pipe, this year I have to get mufflers for it due to ny inspection laws I bought it with straight pipes my question is is the 2008 Hyosung Aquila gv250 the same bike? I found a oem set of pipes on ebay and wanted to make sure prior to ordering.
